segments.text: Let me take in this kitchen viewâ€”it's a typical daytime setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman at the sink, methodically drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's running steadily into the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflow starting to spill over the edge slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming at her feet on the tile floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, open cabinets reveal the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on a step stool, reaching right in for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His posture is stretched, but determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands close, arm up in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden through the window adds a touch of green calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back let in plenty of light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a snapshot of family life in motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the subtle tilt of the stool now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the scene feels warmly domestic still.
segments.speaker: PAR
